name: Supataimu Sentai ULTRA
description:
SUPATAIMU SENTAI ULTRA [スーパータイム戦隊 ULTRA]

[Created for Brackeys jam 2020.2]

This is a small game, perhaps it is more correct to call it an alpha demo. I am excited to continue developing this idea to make it a real game someday...

Have fun and support this project!

[Please note that this version has some bugs and some missing elements like enemy health bar, camera shake and in-game tutorial. These problems are mostly due to the limited time available for game jam. I'm already working to fix these issues and an updated version will be available after the game jam is over]

MOVEMENT CONTROL

wasd / arrows: move

j: shot

k: dash

TIME CONTROL

w-s / up-down: select character

a-d / left-right: rewind-fast forward time

OTHER CONTROL

space: start game

esc: quit / exit

x: fullscreen / windowed

SCREEN RESOLUTION

1280x720 screen resolution or 16:9 aspect ratio is recommended
